text: Umesh Sharma is an Indian politician and member of the Bharatiya Janata Party. Sharma is a member of the Uttarakhand Legislative Assembly from the Raipur constituency in Dehradun district.I WAS BEING PRESSURISED TO SHIFT MY CONSTITUENCY: UMESH SHARMAMy NetaI can't shift to Dehradun Cantt seat: Raipur MLA == References == Category:Indian National Congress politicians Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Uttarakhand Category:Members of the Uttarakhand Legislative Assembly Category:Living people Category:Uttarakhand MLAs 2017– Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Umesh Sharma
